product_name: Ruffwear Summit Trex Boots - Burnt Orange
long_description: Equip your dog with the Ruffwear Summit Trex dog boots and bag peaks together. Your furry, four-legged friend will wag his tail about the flexible traction and protection from rocks, ice and debris. High-mileage, nonmarking outsoles sport a flexible lug design that gives your dog tactile control on terra firma. Integrated stretch gaiters protect legs and seal out dirt and debris. Weather-resistant uppers help block moisture. Intuitive, rip-and-stick cinch straps make it easy to put boots onto paws and keep them securely in place. Ruffwear Summit Trex dog boots feature reflective trim that helps provide low-light visibility from multiple angles. Set of 4.
short_description: Equip your dog with the Ruffwear Summit Trex dog boots and bag peaks together. Your furry, four-legged friend will wag his tail about the flexible traction and protection from rocks, ice and debris.
